Text: Years ago my friend Lemmy Kilmister encountered this world during his many travels.
A world torn apart by war, its people suffering under the oppression of a cruel politician.
Lemmy decided something had to be done.
This is why he left his precious creation Snaggletooth to stand against this evil.
For years the mighty rebel kept The Fhrer at bay.
But something went bad and now Snaggletooth lies silent and lifeless.
This is when I called for the demon hunter Victor.
First I heard about him from one of the weirdos hanging in my pub.
A demon hunter might be just the man to stand against such evil.
This place looks dead. More desolate than the Demon World.
How can something made of metal move like it's alive?
It looks twisted. Good that it cant get up here.
Come to think of it, I wouldn't mind a drink right now.
Yes, that's Lemmy. He asked to be left alone though.
Victor, there you are! Grab a chair, everything is on the house!
Over there, that magnificent grand bastard is Snaggletooth, the one I wrote you about.
That's Snaggletooth? I could swear something that looked just like him attacked me out there.
No way! Unfortunately, our rebel is dead as a rock. Just look at him.
Snaggletooth fought the evil masters in three worlds. Without him to stand against these demons, they will soon ravage other worlds as well.
This is where you come in: Carry on the fight of Snaggletooth and my dear friend Lemmy. Kill the masters! Bring them what they deserve.
It's never that simple, Lloyd. They always come back --
They're mortal, Victor. I've found out as much. They might have been human once, but no more.
Alright. I'll pay a visit to those masters and see what I find. But I will not promise anything.
It's dangerous to go alone, so you'd better take this! It's a journal with my findings and Lemmy's stories that I've collected over all the years.
"I saw the millions, the naked and the dead...I saw a thousand bombers..."
Fearmongering and lies gave total power to Fhrer. He used it to sow the destruction and atrocities that now make up this world.
Needless to say, Lemmy and the rebels were having none of this.
I remember white heat radiating from a reflective, chromed husk.
I remember flames of vengeance engulfing the Fhrers cronies.
A truly unbeatable force had been unleashed to bring him down  Snaggletooth himself.
Lemmy wanted to make sure that no fellow rebel will be ever forgotten.
At every site where a brother or sister in arms has fallen, a powerful Monument of Rock was erected, infused with the music that was the essence of their spirit.
Oddly enough, these monuments seem to attract monsters like nothing else in this devastated world.
Lemmy once worked in a factory.
They told him to cut his hair or get a hair net  said it was a hazard!
Forget art and all that bullshit.
In the words of Lemmy, if you can send that shiver down a kids back, then thats what its all about.
Ive seen a lot of politicians come and go and they are all the same mealy-mouthed bastards,
kissing frikkin babies and shaking hands with hard hats and shit and everybody knows that its a game and they STILL play it.
Those are Lemmy's words, not mine.
Weve never had a good world, we dont understand how to make it in a good world.
The only thing weve really learned is how to kill more people from further away. That way we don't have to see it.
There once was a funny little man with tiny hands who dreamt of building the biggest one.
And he had the insane idea of forcing the ones behind it to build it with their own hands.
His minions loved him for it.
This world is strange. Ravaged by war, but not the kind I know.
This machine of war looks man-made.
What deranged mind would create such a thing?
What was so powerful that it could destroy these armored machines?
You need thousands of soldiers to wage a war like this.
The demons couldn't invent such a war.
They brought it here from another place.
I pity the world where it came from.
If that world is still alive.
The secret stash of some unlucky deserter, probably.
Machines built for war, fighting endless battles with bullets and bombs.
Powerful enough to bring destruction of this scale, yet a coward, hiding behind machinery.
Only war can bring strength! Only war can bring progress! Only war can bring peace!
In its flames a new race will be born, a master race to bring justice to every world!
And as these new conquerors are born, we will shout together: We have the power!
Today we find ourselves beset by envious enemies on all sides!
For, they smell the weakness of our incompetent leaders, and they mistake this weakness to be the weakness of the people.
Well, I ask you; Are you WEAK?
Victor Vran! Do you like my playground?
Mein war machine is waiting for you!
You have never seen anything like it!
Now this, demon hunter, is a bomber.
You have never seen anything like it, I know.
It is going to kill you! <laugh>
"Cry 'Havoc!', und let slip the dogs of war".
Oh, that was not from your world, hunter!
Don't worry, mein dogs don't mind!
No heroes in mein world, Victor.
When you die here, you're just a statistic.
You can defeat mein lieutenants, hunter, but you cannot defeat mein latest creation, mein Warpig tank!
Brought to life by the very essence of Snaggletooth, this machine of war will crush you in an instant!
Snaggletooth machine? Lloyd wont believe this!
When Fhrer encountered Snaggletooth for the first time, he recognized both a threat to his regime, and the potential to solidify his rule by iron fist.
Section: MH-01-03 World Wars Banters in The Furnace

Text: Bombs and bullets were sufficient enough to bring on thorough destruction, but the Fhrer wanted something more sophisticated. He wanted something with an edge.

Text: I can only say that his experimentations are... well, they better stay forgotten.
Section: MH-01-04 World Wars Banters in The Garrison

Text: Now, during the earlier days of the fight against Fhrer, a while before Snaggletooth was unleashed; Lemmy and the rebels operated from this very place.

Text: A lot of legendary songs were written here, under the rhythm of constant bombardments outside.
Section: MH-01-05 World Wars Banters in Bedeviled Vault

Text: The evil warpig! It's a giant man made machine! The Fhrer built it to mimic Snaggletooth.
Section: MH-01-06 Cut Scene - Lemmy gives you his Bass

Text: Hmm, that makes sense - trying to use that tremendous power Snaggletooth embodies... Hey, Victor, let me fix you a drink before you kick its pretender ass.
Section: MH-01-06 Cut Scene - Lemmy gives you his Bass

Text: Lemmy had to leave, Victor, and he won't be coming back, I'm afraid. He feels that you are able. And it is now up to you now, to finish what he started.
Section: MH-01-06 Cut Scene - Lemmy gives you his Bass

Text: So you think have found a way to best me, hunter?
Nein, what you have found is your own destruction!
The time of heroes und rebels is over!
The time of mein machines has come!
Look at mein tank! Mein tank is amazing!
Powered by the very essence of Snaggletooth, it is the most destructive creation in the universe!
Nein, this cannot be! Nein. Nein! Nein!! Aaaaaaaaaaarrrrrrgh!
Never gamble with Lemmy! I lost all my money to him before he left. Feel free to buy anything you want. Even if you dont want it.
Section: MH-01-07 Side conversation with Special Vendor

Text: Did you see that, man?! A glimpse of light in his eyes! Just like in the old days!
Section: MH-01-08 Cut scene after defeat of Corrupted Warpig

Text: Snaggletooth is not as dead as I thought. Perhaps there is hope! ... Yes, there is hope!
Section: MH-01-08 Cut scene after defeat of Corrupted Warpig

Text: Good job dealing with that fanatic. You bet your life you don't need religion, that's what Lemmy always said. Hey, here is a drink.
Section: MH-01-09 Conversation with Lloyd after boss fight

Text: The Preacher banned all kinds of gambling, alcohol and music.
The only enterntainment these poor people living here would get were the rotting corpses in the sun, hanging from gallows, and the massacres of so-called rebels.
Now everyone's either gone or corrupted.
Lemmy and the Sheriff once sat down in a game of cards. The loser had to leave town.
Just as the Sheriff had been dealt the seemingly winning hand, Lemmy drew the one card that would undo the Sheriff  the ace of... the ace of...was it clubs?
Damn it, damn it, I cant remember! I dont play cards.
"You dont need no golden cross to tell you wrong from right. The worlds worst murderers were those who saw the light."
Lies, manipulation and absolute power over the masses. That's the Preacher's religion in a nutshell.
Filling the people's minds with religious bullshit, thats what the Preacher can do best.
There is only one god, faith healing, making people scared about hell, making them excited about desperate virgins waiting in heaven... You name it...
The native tribes had fought the Preacher and lost. The Sheriff and his Deputy tried to drive him out but met a grim fate.
In the end, under the guise of doing Gods bidding, he had poisoned peoples minds so much, that even death turned its bony back on this place, perpetuating those who outlived any decency.
<preaching>The Lord looks down upon us and peers deep into our wretched souls.
He sees sickness; he sees the works of the devil.
We have betrayed our loving father, betrayed him by permitting sinners to walk free, to stand between us and our savior.
<preaching>And I will strike down upon thee with great vengeance and furious anger those who attempt to poison and destroy my brothers.
And you will know I am the Lord when I lay my vengeance upon you.
<preaching>Conflict follows wrongdoing as surely as flies follow the herd.
And we shall punish each and every wrongdoer on this scourged earth in the name of our Lord, and lo, there will be peace in the herd, and the herd will follow in the word of the Lord!
The pagans, who resisted the one true Lord, are gone forever.
Soon all other sinners will follow them into damnation!
What evil corrupted this world, I wonder.
The path of God. "Only in the leap from the lion's head will he prove his worth."
At least they wear proper hats in this place.
Natives tried to protect themselves from demons and religion with these totems.
And restless dead below the ground.
Even criminals and desperados resisted the Preachers rule at first.
The legend goes that a vicious gang fought him and lost, slaughtered to the last man.
The Preacher was smart enough to recognize the threat that Snaggletooth would be for his order and sought to counter it early enough.
An army of undead workers was ordered to dig up this canyon for the precious mystical metal with which the mechanical beast Ograsmatron was built.
The tribe folk whisper that death had abandoned this realm in disbelief after the Preacher had asserted his holy order.

Those who would not serve as undead forever could escape persecution by drowning themselves in the waters of the slowly vanishing springs deep under the mountains, the only place where one could truly die.
Welcome to our holiest shrine, devil!
Section: MH-02-05 Wild West Orgazmatron Boss Fight

Text: This place of worship will be your doom!
Section: MH-02-05 Wild West Orgazmatron Boss Fight

Text: This is our new church, a place which my flock has built to defeat the blasphemous idol Snaggletooth!
Section: MH-02-05 Wild West Orgazmatron Boss Fight
MH-02-05 Wild West Orgazmatron Boss Fight

Text: The power of the Lord compels you, sinner!
Section: MH-02-05 Wild West Orgazmatron Boss Fight

Text: Bow your head and face HIS judgment  spare yourself mine.
Section: MH-02-05 Wild West Orgazmatron Boss Fight

Text: No, no, please don't kill me!
Section: MH-02-05 Wild West Orgazmatron Boss Fight

Text: Mercy, mercy, I don't want to go back, no, noooo!
Section: MH-02-05 Wild West Orgazmatron Boss Fight

Text: It's alive! Snaggletooth woke up again, but just for a few moments.
Section: MH-02-06 Cut scene after Orgazmatron defeat

Text: Don't give up, Victor! You can bring him back to life.
Section: MH-02-06 Cut scene after Orgazmatron defeat

Text: Now, once upon a time there was a Queen. The "Queen of the Damned" they called her.
Section: MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters

Text: She kept her eternal beauty by bathing in blood. Only the screams of the tortured helped her sleep at night.
Section: MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters

Text: This massive castle is where the Queen resides - if there is a Hell on Earth, this is the place.
Section: MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters

Text: Every night she sent out her most loyal, evil servants to steal the remaining children from their mothers arms and to bring any rebelling citizens straight to her.
Section: MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters

Text: No one who entered the Castle that way ever came back.
Section: MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters

Text: The only thing the Queen loves is her riches.
Section: MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters

Text: Lemmy once said: Fame and fortune? Ill be famous, but Ill never be rich.
Section: MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters

Text: If I had a million dollars one day, Id spend it all on goodies.
Section: MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters

Text: Was the Queen ever happy, even at the height of her conquests?
Section: MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters

Text: Nah, you cant get a smile out of rich people with a frikkin crowbar!
Section: MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters

Text: Rich people are usually miserable bastards, Lemmy always said that.
Section: MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters

Text: Desire is the key to the soul. The burning flames of desire are in everyone, eating them from within.
Section: MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters

Text: To satisfy the urges of their deepest desire, they will damn their souls, lay their world at my feet and crown me as their Queen.
Section: MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters

Text: A band of bards has found their way into my realm, bringing along with them a most curious beast named Snaggletooth.
Section: MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters

Text: The bards dare openly challenge my reign, not able to grasp the simplest facts of life. The strong will always rule over the weak, the rich will always own the poor.
Section: MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters
MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters

Text: A demon-infested, grim kind of home.
Section: MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters

Text: Now, let me find this Queen and introduce myself.
Section: MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters

Text: Those were crop fields long ago.
Section: MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters
MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters
MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters
MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters

Text: Hello, old friends! Did you miss me?
Section: MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters

Text: The castle. The Queen of the Damned can't be far away.
Section: MH-03-01 Queen of the Damned Banters

Text: Let's see what is in this cellar.
My bet is on the usual - wine, demons and witches.
Time stopped flowing here long ago.
The ruling family would isolate themselves within their castle, lost in dark deeds, greed and search for immortality.
In between, the ordinary people would perish in riots, in plagues and in famine.
The rich never cared about the poor and this time was no different.
I have a feeling that the slaughtered in this place won't be mere animals.
The bloodless remains of the victims were often tossed back to the peasants, as there was nothing else left for them to fill their stomachs.
Giving their miserable lives or their youngs blood to serve me is their privilege.
My silky skin, my perpetual youth and my mystical powers  surely they are worth more than the lives of few peasants.
In the early days of the Queen's reign she summoned an aberration, an aberration that feasted on warmth, just as the queen feasted on greed, blood and suffering.
This whole place froze, the warmth was sucked out of the air.
The beast was eventually defeated by Snaggletooth, but its lair still carries the taint.
Some unholy ritual took place here.
Let's see what the succubi left behind.
The Queen of the Damned took the reins of the realm virtually without challenge.
Section: MH-03-04 Pathway to Queen of the Damned

Text: Insatiably hungry for riches and immortality, the nobles had condemned themselves through dark pacts.
Section: MH-03-04 Pathway to Queen of the Damned

Text: They practically rolled out the red carpet for her.
Section: MH-03-04 Pathway to Queen of the Damned

Text: That bitch, the Queen, preys on the peasants, herding them like cattle, bathing into their blood.
Section: MH-03-04 Pathway to Queen of the Damned

Text: Take the fight to her! Eat the rich, feed the poor!
Section: MH-03-04 Pathway to Queen of the Damned

Text: Do you like my domain, Victor?
Section: MH-03-04 Pathway to Queen of the Damned
MH-03-04 Pathway to Queen of the Damned

Text: I captured the soul of the beast Snaggletooth and you will be my next trophy!
Section: MH-03-04 Pathway to Queen of the Damned

Text: Some fresh blood would do wonders for the Royal bloodline!
Section: MH-03-04 Pathway to Queen of the Damned

Text: At last I have you in my parlor, Victor!
Section: MH-03-05 Queen of the Damned Boss fight

Text: So close now that I can feel the world that you came from!
Section: MH-03-05 Queen of the Damned Boss fight

Text: I will devour it as I devoured this one!
Section: MH-03-05 Queen of the Damned Boss fight

Text: Embrace me, Victor. Let us dance!
Section: MH-03-05 Queen of the Damned Boss fight
MH-03-05 Queen of the Damned Boss fight

Text: Are you this gentle with all women?
Section: MH-03-05 Queen of the Damned Boss fight
MH-03-05 Queen of the Damned Boss fight

Text: Does your blood look good on me?
Section: MH-03-05 Queen of the Damned Boss fight
MH-03-05 Queen of the Damned Boss fight

Text: I captured the essence of Snaggletooth himself.
Section: MH-03-05 Queen of the Damned Boss fight

Text: Like sin and blood, I am eternal!
Section: MH-03-05 Queen of the Damned Boss fight
MH-03-05 Queen of the Damned Boss fight

Text: With a final scream the vile queen burst into oblivion.
Free from her magic, the trapped soul of Snaggletooth returned to his body.
Lemmy's greatest creation, the rebel Snaggletooth lives again.
I have a new favorite place to get a drink. And a new friend.
I never had the chance to really get to know the man who started it all. And I never will.
Lemmy Kilmister. Born to lose, live to win.
I am the master of this place and I've got total power here but, alas, I'm powerless outside. But enough of this - what can I get you to drink, buddy?
Here are Lemmy's doodles. He loved to scribble the crap out of every piece of paper in this place.
Section: MH-04-01 Side Conversation Lloyd introduces Doodles
MH-04-01 Side Conversation Lloyd introduces Doodles

Text: I've got have something else for you here, something to help you along. Some of Lemmy's magic, a Motorpower you could say.
Section: MH-04-02 Side Conversation Lloyd offers Demon Powers 1

Text: I have something else for you, something to support you in your fight. Another of Lemmys grand Motrpowers.
Section: MH-04-03 Side Conversation Lloyd offers Demon Powers 2

Text: There you go. One more Motrpower for you.
Section: MH-04-04 Side Conversation Lloyd offers Demon Powers 3

Text: You know, Victor, like my pub here, Lemmy's music  Motrhead - is a universal thing. It goes for everybody. We dont segregate our audience. Anybody who watches our thing and enjoys it deserves a place to see us.
I always preferred my low-tech mop over high-tech weapons. And I love the cocktail shaker, of course. The magic potions I brew can really blow you off your ass!

What is Rock & Roll? In the immortal words of Lemmy, Rock is about going out on a Saturday night, getting drunk, being sick down your threads and pulling a bird  although not necessarily in that order.
The Locus. This will be my base of operations. A bit cold and hostile but it should do.
Section: TAL-001 Victor enters the Fractured World for the first time and sees the only stable place which is going to be his foothold

Text: The Solicitor told me the first shard of the Astrolabe would be here.
Section: TAL-001 Victor enters the Fractured World for the first time and sees the only stable place which is going to be his foothold

Text: What is this light? As if it wants to be found.
Section: TAL-001 Victor enters the Fractured World for the first time and sees the only stable place which is going to be his foothold

Text: That is only the first shard of my precious creation; The Astrolabe. Follow its directions and you will find the rest. I will help you complete it.
Section: TAL-002 Victor has taken the Pointer - the first piece of the Astrolabe and receives instructions

Text: The Fracture is the emanation of chaos. Trust nothing but your intuition, Victor, or the Fracture will consume you and grind your essence like the rest of this hapless world.
Section: TAL-003 Victor enters the chaotic labyrinth of the Fracture for the first time

Text: How can I know where to find the Frame then?
Section: TAL-003 Victor enters the chaotic labyrinth of the Fracture for the first time

Text: You cannot. That's the charm of it.
Section: TAL-003 Victor enters the chaotic labyrinth of the Fracture for the first time

Text: Strange. As if the artifacts react to their reunion. I can't shake the feeling that the Pointer turned on its own, towards Ea.
Section: TAL-004 After fusing the Pointer to the Frame of the Astrolabe

Text: How can a place touched by chaos look so beautiful and ordered?
Section: TAL-005 Admiring the arcane beauty of the Hanging Gardens of Ea for the first time

Text: Beautiful but deadly, hunter. When the Astrolabe was shattered, the souls I used to power it took shape. They are still bound to it. But nothing you cannot handle.
Section: TAL-005 Admiring the arcane beauty of the Hanging Gardens of Ea for the first time

Text: Is this an illusion? The surface of the artifact changes. This image in the crooked brass looks like a ruined city. It led me to the right place once, it could do it again.
Section: TAL-006 Victor finds the next piece and after fusing them begins to realize that the artifact is indeed alive

Text: An entire world of ruins. What happened here?
Section: TAL-007 Shocked after seeing the endless plane of ruin that is the Cadaver City

Text: Nothing and everything - the Cadaver City is the emanation of the ruin mortals bring upon themselves in all worlds and all times. You should concentrate on your task if you want to avoid the fate of the fallen.
Section: TAL-007 Shocked after seeing the endless plane of ruin that is the Cadaver City

Text: A breath of fresh forest air, rustling of leaves. This is new. The artifact grows more creative in its messages.
Section: TAL-008 First strong illusion from the now-awakening Astrolabe

Text: The contrast is mesmerizing, from a lifeless husk of a city to a living forest!
Section: TAL-009 Entering the Amaranthine Forest for the first time

Text: A twisted imitation of life, nonetheless. Spare no time wondering, hunter. It must be completed.
Section: TAL-009 Entering the Amaranthine Forest for the first time

Text: The new shard fuses perfectly and... There it is, the vision, a cold spooky womb of a vast cavern closing around me. I'll never get used to this.
Section: TAL-010 Fusing the next shard into the Astrolabe

Text: I feel strange. What am I doing here? Who am I?
Section: TAL-011 Entering the Lethean Caverns for the first time

Text: Concentrate, hunter. Indeed, the waters of the river Lethe had drained long ago, but its essence of oblivion still lingers. Hold tight to the Astrolabe and it will remind you of your purpose.
Section: TAL-011 Entering the Lethean Caverns for the first time

Text: The Astrolabe cannot be completed here. You need stability to counteract the entropy of chaos. Return to the Locus, hunter.
Section: TAL-012 Finding the last shard of the first section of the Astrolabe

Text: The Astrolabe kindly rewards those who serve it, Victor.
Section: TAL-013 Victor returns with the first section of the Astrolabe completed and the artifact materializes a kind reward in front of him

Text: I thought it was meant to serve me.
Section: TAL-013 Victor returns with the first section of the Astrolabe completed and the artifact materializes a kind reward in front of him

Text: I promised no such thing. Your relationship is one of mutual interest. It craves to be completed and you need it for your own goals.
Section: TAL-013 Victor returns with the first section of the Astrolabe completed and the artifact materializes a kind reward in front of him

Text: The Astrolabe is a wise advisor. Follow its instructions. Without question. Farewell, mortal.
Section: TAL-013 Victor returns with the first section of the Astrolabe completed and the artifact materializes a kind reward in front of him
TAL-013 Victor returns with the first section of the Astrolabe completed and the artifact materializes a kind reward in front of him

Text: The artifact grows stronger by the hour. It has a warm, peaceful presence in my thoughts leading me in the right direction.
Section: TAL-014 Victor takes time to reflect on his situation and the connection with the Astrolabe

Text: The new shard fuses with the Astrolabe and I am filled with purpose and completeness. I glimpse a distant vision: myself as a demon. Then in the blink of an eye it's gone.
Section: TAL-015 The self-consciousness of Victor warns him for the crawling influence of the Astrolabe but is dismissed

Text: The glory of the Hanging Gardens brings me painful memories of my lost kingdom. It haunted me for years and I grew used to the lingering anguish. Soon it will be over. I must press on.
Section: TAL-016 The Astrolabe subtly begins projecting painful memories to later grant relief and pleasure to Victor

Text: This one is different: I see myself departing from my devastated homeland. But there is no discomfort, only the vibrant warmth of the shard.
Section: TAL-017 The Astrolabe rewards Victor with relief from the painful memories

Text: If it wasn't for the Astrolabe I would have wasted a lifetime hunting demons. I see the truth now. I'm no longer a prisoner of my past.
Section: TAL-018 The Astrolabe starts making Victor repelled by his past

Text: The Astrolabe in my hand pulses with my heartbeat. The routine is familiar: another shard, another moment of bliss. Then emptiness. I need to find more.
Section: TAL-019 Victor falls deeper into the influence of the Astrolabe

Text: Through my whole life I kept reminding myself of my past mistakes. Now I ask myself why. How can I help anyone if I don't help myself first?
Section: TAL-020 The self-consciousness of Victor is almost completely overwhelmed by his wish to compensate for his past and by the Astrolabe

Text: The only way to reach for the future is to let go of my past. The Astrolabe is here to guide me and I need nothing more in my heart.
Section: TAL-021 Victor has given himself in

Text: I should have run away years ago, run away from my past that makes me half a person. My only hope is the Astrolabe. My only hope...
Section: TAL-022 The Astrolabe completely changed the desires of Victor to match its own

Text: My hands are shaking with excitement. Don't drop the shard, Victor. What if it breaks? No, no, that can't happen.
I am glad you returned safely, Victor. How does your journey progress?
Section: TAL-024 The Solicitor tries to push Victor over the edge

Text: It's strange but Ive never felt so free before. Free from guilt, free from grief. As if my past never happened.
Section: TAL-024 The Solicitor tries to push Victor over the edge

Text: I had hoped to hear that, Victor. The Astrolabe lets you focus on what is most important to you. Now you realize that you sacrificed too much in your exile, fighting the power of the demon. Follow your heart's desire, Victor.
Section: TAL-024 The Solicitor tries to push Victor over the edge

Text: Wait. Do I really need to run away from my past to feel better? Was everything I did so wrong? And this. The Astrolabe presence cuts sharply in my mind. What do you want from me?
Section: TAL-025 The self-consciousness of Victor has not abandoned him yet

Text: I am watching my own shaking hand fusing the shard in the urging Astrolabe. It promises happiness. Here it comes. Bliss. And more bliss. But this time it is different, tainted by my doubts.
Section: TAL-026 Victor reflects on his situation for the first time

Text: Had I gone too far? Did I reject my own self in favor of another Victor? I feel cold on the inside, only the spirit of the Astrolabe glows like a small sun.

Aaaa Aaaaaa Aaaaaargh! Its over! Why it is over? The ecstasy threatened to erase my conscience and I barely managed to come back. My dearest tried to enslave me! I feel empty and betrayed. Who had I become?
Section: TAL-028 Victor begins to realize he has traded his own self for simple pleasures given by an object

Text: Father. I remember the day you died. The grief and desperation are no less even now. No! I do not need your false comfort, demon contraption. You are a tool, not my master.
Section: TAL-029 The one memory Victor never wanted to abandon brings him back

Text: The shard is back in its place and I still tremble from the effort I spent to resist its influence. It tried to take over me again. The panic engulfed me until I remembered who I was.
This is my own tale and the Astrolabe is nothing but my pen. It knows it and grows more vicious.
Section: TAL-031 Victor is ready for one last push against the Astrolabe

Text: I felt the agony of the Astrolabe as I held the shard an inch away from it. When I was sure the artifact was subdued, I let the piece join the rest. It lies calm and silent now but I already know where to find the last shard.
Are you looking for something, Victor?
Section: TAL-033 Victor confronts the Solicitor who plotted against him the whole time

Text: The last shard of the Astrolabe. You have it.
Section: TAL-033 Victor confronts the Solicitor who plotted against him the whole time

Text: Always so bothersome. Why couldn't you give in and succumb to the artifact? It would have made all of us so much happier.
Section: TAL-033 Victor confronts the Solicitor who plotted against him the whole time

Text: Your foul schemes end now, demon. Hand over the shard or face the consequences.
Section: TAL-033 Victor confronts the Solicitor who plotted against him the whole time

Text: I will not fight you, Victor. The memory of our last confrontation still lingers. If I cannot have The Astrolabe neither can you. I have thrown the shard into the depths of the Fracture. Now none of us shall have it.
Section: TAL-033 Victor confronts the Solicitor who plotted against him the whole time

Text: I still have my chance to find it, demon. Youve lost yours.  The shard will be mine.
Section: TAL-033 Victor confronts the Solicitor who plotted against him the whole time

Text: Be my guest. It will be amusing to watch you fail.
Section: TAL-033 Victor confronts the Solicitor who plotted against him the whole time

Text: You must be careful what you wish for, as it might come true. My wish nearly cost me my soul. The Fractured Worlds taught me a lesson:. It is what you do that defines who you are.
The guardians of the mortal race.
New Translation: The guardians of the mortal race.

Text: When Zagoravia fell, they came in droves.
New Translation: When Zagoravia fell, they came in droves.

Text: They carved a bloody path through the petty monsters,
New Translation: They carved a bloody path through the petty monsters,

Text: deeper and deeper into the cursed city.
New Translation: deeper and deeper into the cursed city.

Text: I hunt demons for a living. It is a lonely trade.
New Translation: I hunt demons for a living. It is a lonely trade.

New Translation: At first you're the hero, the savior.

Text: But when the job is done, things quickly change.
Old Text: When the job is done, people quickly cool off.
Old Translation: But when the job is done, things quickly change.
New Translation: But when the job is done, things quickly change.

Text: People realize you're as much a monster as the ones you hunt.
Old Text: They realize you're as much a monster as the ones you hunt.
Old Translation: People realize you're as much a monster as the ones you hunt.

Text: Some demons are mindless. Those are the easy ones.
Old Text: Some demons are mindless. The easy ones.

New Translation: Some demons are mindless. Those are the easy ones.

Text: Others are fierce and cunning warriors, fearless and ancient machines of destruction.

Do you know that the gold which you bring here has some peculiar physical qualities? Perhaps it comes from the demon world.
Section: side: Alchemist 01 On why demons drop gold
Old Text: Do you know that the gold which you bring here has some peculiar physical qualities? Perhaps it comes from the demon world.

Section: side: Alchemist 01 On why demons drop gold

Text: Never mind, what can I offer you today?
Section: side: Alchemist 01 On why demons drop gold
Old Text: Never mind, what can I offer you today?
Old Translation: Never mind, what can I offer you today?

Text: I hope that contraption of yours isn't going to blow up the castle.
Section: side: Alchemist 011 Presenting the device to remake items
Old Text: I hope that contraption of yours is not going to blow up the castle.

Text: If I didn't know you I'd be insulted. Since we're friends I'll introduce you to my little baby - the Desolidifier! Oh, wait, this is not the right one. Ah, here it is - the Transmogrifier 10,000!
Section: side: Alchemist 011 Presenting the device to remake items

Text: Oh yes, I've been trying to fix it ever since we fled here and now it works almost every time! It allows you to transfer matter and essence from one form to another, in other words, to change the way your equipment works or to create completely different, and much better items! The only drawback of this prototype is that it will consume a tiny bit of your gold every time you use it.
Section: side: Alchemist 011 Presenting the device to remake items
